string-array.name: new_in_version_changes
string-array.item: - Added Multiplayer Example\n - Added TouchDragMany Example

- Line Example now with random line width
 - Added Zoom Example
 - Added SpriteRemove Example
 - Added Sprites Benchmark
- Benchmark results now can be submitted by mail

- Removed SpritesExample
 - New animation in AnimatedSpritesExample
 - Added PhysicsJump Example
 - Added SpriteBenchmark
 - Added AnimationBenchmark
- Made Benchmarks harder (so near-future devices do not already cap at 60 FPS)
- Added possible performance fix for the Droid/Milestone
- Added ParticleSystemCool Example\n - Added ParticleSystemNexus Example\n - Added ParticleSystem Benchmark
- Added ImageFormat Example (PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP)
- Benchmarks now get submitted to a Server instead of mail to me.
- Added ModPlayer Example\n - Added ChangeableText Example
- Optimized some Examples/Benchmarks by using the new FixedCapacityLayers
- Added Analog On-Screen Controls\n - Added Digital On-Screen Controls
- Added Dual Analog On-Screen Controls\n - Improved Snake (Game)
- Changed TextureOptions Example to show repeating Textures\n - Added a LoopModifier to ShapeModifier Example
- Added MultiTouch Example\n - Removed TouchDragMany Example
- Now using the libGDX Box2D Wrapper\n - Added PhysicsRevoluteJoint Example
- Added SpriteBackground Example\n - Improved PathModifier Example
- Added BoundCamera Example\n - Improved Racer Game with some boxes to collide with
- Adaptions due to changes in AndEngine
- Benchmarks now also submit info about Memory
- Moved to new \'EntityContainer\' branch (which is now default)\n - Added Pong (Multiplayer) Game
